trans-unit.resname: OPC2·1 | Chaotic Aether | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chaotic Aether
trans-unit.target: Chaotic Aether

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·1 | Chaotic Aether | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, each blank roll of the planar die is a {CHAOS} roll until a player planeswalks away from a plane. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, each blank roll of the planar die is a {CHAOS} roll until a player planeswalks away from a plane. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·2 | Interplanar Tunnel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Interplanar Tunnel
trans-unit.target: Interplanar Tunnel

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·2 | Interplanar Tunnel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal five plane cards. Put a plane card from among them on top of your planar deck, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom in a random order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal five plane cards. Put a plane card from among them on top of your planar deck, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom in a random order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·3 | Morphic Tide | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Morphic Tide
trans-unit.target: Morphic Tide

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·3 | Morphic Tide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, land, and planeswalker cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library in any order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, land, and planeswalker cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library in any order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.source: Mutual Epiphany
trans-unit.target: Mutual Epiphany

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·4 | Mutual Epiphany | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, each player draws four cards. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, each player draws four cards. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, destroy all creatures. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·6 | Reality Shaping | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reality Shaping
trans-unit.target: Reality Shaping

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·6 | Reality Shaping | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·7 | Spatial Merging | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spatial Merging
trans-unit.target: Spatial Merging

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·7 | Spatial Merging | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.
trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·8 | Time Distortion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Time Distortion
trans-unit.target: Time Distortion

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·8 | Time Distortion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, reverse the game's turn order. (For example, if play had proceeded clockwise around the table, it now goes counterclockwise. Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: When you encounter CARDNAME, reverse the game's turn order. (For example, if play had proceeded clockwise around the table, it now goes counterclockwise. Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·36 | Talon Gates | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Any time you could cast a sorcery, you may exile a nonland card from your hand with X time counters on it, where X is its mana value. If the exiled card doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, the player may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)
trans-unit.target: Any time you could cast a sorcery, you may exile a nonland card from your hand with X time counters on it, where X is its mana value. If the exiled card doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, the player may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·36 | Talon Gates | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, remove two time counters from each suspended card you own.
trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, remove two time counters from each suspended card you own.

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·37 | Trail of the Mage-Rings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Trail of the Mage-Rings
trans-unit.target: Trail of the Mage-Rings

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·37 | Trail of the Mage-Rings | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells have rebound. (The spell's controller exiles the spell as it resolves if they cast it from their hand. At the beginning of that player's next upkeep, they may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: Instant and sorcery spells have rebound. (The spell's controller exiles the spell as it resolves if they cast it from their hand. At the beginning of that player's next upkeep, they may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·37 | Trail of the Mage-Rings | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
